title: Gluten free fish pie
ingredients: ['600g potatoes, peeled and sliced', '250g haddock fillets', '250g smoked cod fillets', '300ml milk, plus more for mashed potatoes', '2 tablespoons gluten free cornflour', 'salt and pepper to taste', '100g mushrooms, chopped', '80g frozen peas', '100g cheese, grated', '1 knob butter', 'Dried herbs']
